name: MediaSource.activeSourceBuffers
description: The activeSourceBuffers read-only property of the MediaSource interface returns a SourceBufferList object containing a subset of the SourceBuffer objects contained within sourceBuffers — the list of objects providing the selected video track, enabled audio tracks, and shown/hidden text tracks.

refs.name: Media Source Extensions
refs.description: The definition of 'activeSourceBuffers' in Media Source Extensions.
